mapper.select: SELECT OP_CODE FROM VIEW_PROCEEDING_PROJECT_PEOPLE WHERE MEM_CODE = #{memCode}
SELECT PC_CODE FROM VIEW_PROCEEDING_PROJECT_PEOPLE WHERE MEM_CODE = #{memCode}

SELECT DISTINCT OP_MEM_CODE FROM OPEN_PROJECT OP LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB TJ ON TJ.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON PA.PA_MEM_CODE = OP.OP_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PC.PC_PA_NO = PA.PA_NO WHERE OP_CODE = #{opCode}
SELECT PC_CODE FROM VIEW_PROCEEDING_PROJECT_PEOPLE WHERE MEM_CODE = #{leaderMemCode}

SELECT PA_MEM_CODE FROM ( SELECT PA_MEM_CODE, LC_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LC_DATE DESC) AS row_num FROM LEADER_CHANGE LC LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON LC.LC_PC_CODE = PC.PC_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB TJ ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = TJ.TJ_NO WHERE TJ_OP_CODE = #{opCode} ) WHERE row_num = 1

SELECT LC_PC_CODE FROM ( SELECT LC_PC_CODE, PA_MEM_CODE, LC_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LC_DATE DESC) AS row_num FROM LEADER_CHANGE LC LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON LC.LC_PC_CODE = PC.PC_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB TJ ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = TJ.TJ_NO WHERE TJ_OP_CODE = #{opCode} ) WHERE row_num = 1

SELECT SD_OP_CODE "sdOpCode" , ASS_CODE "assCode" , ASS_NAME "assName" ,CHARGER "charger" , PI_NICKNAME "piNickName" , ASS_START_DATE "assStartDate" , ASS_END_DATE "assEndDate" , ASS_DATE "assDate" , OU_NAME "ouName" , SS_NAME "ssName" FROM VIEW_ASSIGNMENT WHERE SD_OP_CODE = #{opCode} ORDER BY SS_CODE
SELECT DISTINCT SS_CODE "ssCode", SS_NAME "ssName" FROM OUTPUTS OU LEFT JOIN SCHEDULE_STAGE SS ON SS.SS_CODE = OU.OU_SS_CODE ORDER BY SS_CODE
SELECT SS_CODE "ssCode", SS_NAME "ssName", OU_CODE "ouCode", OU_NAME "ouName" FROM OUTPUTS OU LEFT JOIN SCHEDULE_STAGE SS ON SS.SS_CODE = OU.OU_SS_CODE ORDER BY SS_CODE
